data.title: Vinyl Prices Slashed
data.meta_description: If the posted price is $1 - $9, your price is $1. If the posted price is $10 - $19, your price is $2. If the posted price is $20 and up, your price is $3.
data.text:
SUPERCEDES ALL PREVIOUS LISTS

Minimum order for shipping, $10 worth of vinyl (after any discount), and you pay Media Mail shipping. I accept cash, personal checks, and money orders. I do not have a paypal account, or any mechanism in place for bank to bank transfers. Pre-payment required before shipping.

PLEASE READ PREVIOUS COUPLE SENTENCES AND NEXT COUPLE SENTENCES. THEY’RE SMALL AND IMPORTANT: This is first come, first served. Once you have posted selections please do not go back and add selections to that post. Please post additional selections in a new post at the end of the thread. DO NOT “EDIT” YOUR ORIGINAL POST, MAKE A NEW POST. It can really screw things up if you do that, and I don’t want to be unhappy. DO NOT SEND ME A PM WITH YOUR SELECTIONS, POST YOUR SELECTIONS IN THE THREAD SO OTHERS CAN SEE WHAT YOU SELECT AND IS THEREFORE ALREADY SPOKEN FOR! Please avoid sending any PM’s if at all possible. Prior customers should know the drill by now, and first-timers will get PMed ASAP.

“Pristine” means just that. Like new, or perhaps new (unplayed). “Just about pristine” or “near pristine” could mean one fingerprint, some lint, or the tiniest scratch you NEVER heard. The difference between “pristine” and “just about …” or “near pristine” could be nothing, especially for people with RCM’s. Colors in descriptions pertain to label color/s. Cover grading is A-F with +’s and –‘s in between, and will immediately follow record grading verbage. Perfect cover would be “A+”, and maybe “A++/shrink” if perfect in shrink. Pertinent data may or may not follow the cover grading. Titles may look like GH (Greatest Hits), Bo (Best of), or ST (Self-titled).

Not responsible for selections that already sold I forgot to delete from the list. I apologize in advance.

Please do not post any selections until list has been completely posted. A courtesy to others who are extending that courtesy to you.

Thank you.
